channel.title: Mark Bomback on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Mark Bomback on jverkamp.com

item.title: The Wolverine
item.description: After the less than spectacular performances of X-Men: The Last Stand and X-Men Origins: Wolverine and the wicked snarl of continuity only worsened by X-Men: First Class, it’s impressive that they’re still putting out X-Men movies. Honestly, I’ve enjoyed all of them well enough1, but it’s still a bit strange.

item.title: Total Recall
item.description: Despite coming out only a few years after I was born, I only managed to actually see the original Total Recall film in the last few months. So I didn’t have nearly the nostalgic baggage that a lot of people had coming into it.
